contentrichtext.text: {{BLP IMDb refimprove|date= September 2011}} '''Greg Coolidge''' aka '''Gregory Coolidge''' (born '''''Gregory Kullich''''' December 28, 1972 in [[Redbank, New Jersey]]) is an [[actor]], [[voice actor]], [[screenwriter]], [[Film director|director]], and [[Film producer|producer]] who has been active in [[film|cinema]], [[television]], and [[animation]] since 1995. ==Filmography== Actor: *[[Rocket Power]] (2002)... Trent *[[Sorority Boys]](2002)... Pete *In God We Trust (2000)... Purgatorian *[[Queen for a Day]] (2000)... Rick *[[Possums]] (1998)... Jake Malloy *Profilers (1997)... Gabriel Vanderhorn *[[Hope and Gloria]] (1996)... Dale Writer: *[[Ride Along (film)|Ride Along]] (2014) *[[Dirty Old Men]] (2012) *[[Untitled Greg Coolidge Project]] (2011) *[[The Troop]] (2010) *[[Coxblocker]] (2009) *[[Born to Rock]] (2009) *[[Mancrush]] (2009) *[[Employee of the Month (2006 film)|Employee of the Month]] (2006) *[[Sorority Boys]] (2002) *[[Queen for a Day]] (2000) Director: *[[For Sale]]{{dn|date=February 2012}} (2011) *[[Untitled Greg Coolidge Project]] (2011) *[[Coxblocker]] (2011) *[[The Troop]] (2010) *[[Employee of the Month (2006 film)|Employee of the Month]] (2006) *[[Queen for a Day]] (2000) Producer: *[[Untitled Greg Coolidge Project]] (2011) *[[The Troop]] (2010) *[[Mancrush]] (2009) *[[Possums]] (1998) ==External links== *{{IMDb name|id=0177637|name=Greg Coolidge}} {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME = Coolidge, Greg | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = American actor | DATE OF BIRTH = December 28, 1972 | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Coolidge, Greg}} [[Category:American film actors]] [[Category:American television actors]] [[Category:American voice actors]] [[Category:American screenwriters]] [[Category:Actors from New Jersey]] [[Category:1972 births]] [[Category:Living people]] {{US-screen-actor-1970s-stub}} {{US-screen-writer-stub}} {{US-voice-actor-1970s-stub}}
